description.en: In ancient times, a vile dragon summoned a flood that drowned the village. Since then, every year, the villagers would sacrifice a bride to the dragon for it to eat, doing so ensured the safety and peace of the village. This year, it is the Black Dragon YanMing’s turn to take the sacrificed bride, however he takes no interest in humans and would rather live on a diet of fruits. But, due to the constant nagging of the housekeeper, magpie XiQue, he had no choice but to go to the village and receive the bride offered by the village. YanMing, who was originally against the idea of going, couldn’t help but notice that the “mute” bride was so strange! She wasn’t afraid of him, but instead, very excited?! Whatever…let's capture her first!

altTitles.ja: 黒ギャルさんが来る！

altTitles.en: Black Gal–san Is Coming!
A Black Gal Is Coming!
A black gyaru is coming!

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
description.es-la: Un oficinista asediado encuentra su camino a un café donde denuncia las dificultades de su rutina. Allí, una amable estudiante de secundaria gyaru se da cuenta de sus lamentos y después de oírle desahogarse, le anima a la manera de "gyaru" e intercambian contactos. ¿Qué será de esta improbable amistad?

title.en: Ato wa Gojiyuu ni Douzo! ~Tutorial de Kami-sama ga Last Boss wo Taoshi Chatta node Watashi wa Suki Houdai Ikiteiku~

altTitles.ja: あとはご自由にどうぞ！ ～チュートリアルで神様がラスボスを倒しちゃったので私は好き放題生きていく～

altTitles.en: The Rest is Up to You!: Since God Defeated the Final Boss in the Tutorial, I'm Going to Live my Life However I Want

description.en:
An ordinary Japanese male office worker is suddenly brought to the divine realm. After being transformed into the body of a beautiful girl by the hobby of a goddess present there, I am given the mission of defeating the final boss in order to settle the god’s personal grudge… or so I was supposed to do. Soon after my reincarnation, the goddess who possessed my body killed the final boss in an instant, and my final target disappeared in an instant!?

And after that, I’m told to do as I please in this world. Wait, seriously? I can really live however I want!?

Thus begins the isekai life of a reincarnated beautiful girl, who was originally a man, faithfully indulging in her desires in a world where the final boss was eliminated in just one minute

Cha Gunmu' , who infiltrates the after-party of L Company's shareholders' meeting to find clues about Red Diamond, encounters 'Yeon Taeoh', the youngest son of the Yeonsun Group and a genius racer. While chasing the target, Gunmu witnesses Taeoh drinking alcohol laced with drugs, and ends up saving him and missing the target. In the hotel where the drugged Teoh was laid to rest, something strange happened to the drugged Taeoh...? “Why don’t you bear all your responsibilities to the end?” Gunmu, who was helplessly caught up in Taeoh’s actions, leaves the hotel room disgusted by his arrogant attitude and vows never to see him again, but he hears that his target, Red Diamond, is related to the Yeonseon Group... “This debt will be properly repaid later.” Would this be just a moment of burning pleasure or a tenacious and brutal relationship?
description.fr: Cha Geonmu, qui s'est infiltré à l'after party de la réunion des actionnaires de la société L pour trouver des indices sur Red Diamond, rencontre Yeon Tae-oh le plus jeune fils du groupe Yeonsu, un coureur de jupons. En poursuivant sa cible, Geonmu voit Tae-oh boire un verre rempli d'alcool et de drogues. Il finit par secourir Tae-oh et rate sa cible. Il dépose Tae-oh à un hôtel, mais est-ce qu'il y a un problème avec le Tae-oh drogué...? tu "Pourquoi ne prends responsabilités jusqu'au bout ?" pas tes Ennuyé et dégoûté par l'attitude de Tae-oh, Geonmu quitte la chambre d'hôtel en se promettant de ne plus rencontrer son chemin. Cependant, il découvre que Red Diamond est lié au groupe Yeonsu...

altTitles.en: Love and Curse

altTitles.ja: 愛と呪い

description.en: A semi-autobiographical account of the author as she experiences abuse, sexual and otherwise, at the hands of her family who are also deeply religious. Aiko wished for someone to kill her and the world she lives in. With the Great Hanshin Earthquake, the Aleph doomsday cult, and the Kobe child murders, it seemed like the ends of time was approaching. Unable to dream of "somewhere away from here", all she can do is face her violent life head-on.
description.es-la: Historia semi-autobiográfico de la autora mientras sufre abusos sexuales y otro tipo de cosas, a manos de su familia, que también es profundamente religiosa. Aiko deseaba que alguien acabara con ella y con el mundo en el que vive. Con el Gran Terremoto de Hanshin, la secta del Juicio Final Aleph y los asesinatos de niños de Kobe, parecía que se acercaba el fin de los tiempos. Incapaz de soñar con "algún lugar lejos de aquí", lo único que puede hacer es enfrentarse de frente a su violenta vida.

altTitles.ja: Kurosu maneji
クロス・マネジ

description.en: "Hard working" or "passionate" was not in Sakurai's vocabulary and joining a team sports in school was out of the question. But one day, he accidentally walks in on his female classmate Toyoguchi naked in the locker room and in return for keeping it a secret from everyone else, he is forced to become the manager for the female lacrosse team. Toyoguchi is passionate about lacrosse and was responsible for creating the team for the school. Sakurai reluctantly begins his role as manager but is slowly drawn into Toyoguchi's personality and begins researching and enjoying the sport. The once lazy Sakurai who was scared of failure now learns to put himself out there and put serious effort into something worthwhile.
description.pt-br: “Trabalho duro” ou “apaixonado” não estava no vocabulário de Sakurai e ingressar em um time de esportes na escola estava fora de questão. Mas um dia, ele acidentalmente encontra sua colega Toyoguchi nua no vestiário e, em troca de manter isso em segredo de todos os outros, ele é forçado a se tornar o gerente do time feminino de lacrosse. Toyoguchi é apaixonado por lacrosse e foi o responsável pela criação do time da escola. Sakurai relutantemente começa seu papel como gerente, mas aos poucos é atraído pela personalidade de Toyoguchi e começa a pesquisar e a gostar do esporte. O outrora preguiçoso Sakurai que tinha medo do fracasso agora aprende a se expor e a se esforçar seriamente em algo que vale a pena.

title.en: Inscrutable Are the Ways of Heaven

altTitles.ja: 人間万事塞翁が馬

description.en:
A romance between an introverted employee and an extroverted part-timer at a drugstore.

Bashouguchi, a dead inside drugstore employee, has her life turned upside-down by the new part-timer Kimura, whose flashy looks clash with the clean image of the store.

And it turns out that Kimura has actually had a one-night stand with her?!

Kimura threatens Bashouguchi and sexually harasses her, but she's also her savior since she covers a lot of shifts. This is a yuri about how all of this changes something in the timid Bashouguchi... perhaps.
description.ja:
ドラッグストア陽キャバイト×陰キャ社員百合。

ドラッグストアのくだびれた陰キャ社員・芭蕉口（バショウグチ）のもとに、店のクリーンなイメージにそぐわない見た目でやってきた陽キャバイト・木村（キムラ）。
その木村、実は芭蕉口のワンナイトの相手だった！？
脅してくるしセクハラしてくるけどシフトを埋めてくれる救世主の木村によって、臆病な芭蕉口の何かが変わる……かもしれない百合。

altTitles.ja: エロティック×アナボリック

description.en: Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class. He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit! Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!
description.ja: クラスでは目立たない地味な女子高生の三蔵五葉。そんな彼女が無人の屋上で、制服の下に隠していたエロボディをさらけ出している姿を目撃してしまった阿下喜鏡介。こうして奇しくもエロすぎる肉体のヒミツを共有することになった二人が交わした約束とはいったい!?

I Parry All ~With A Reverse Misunderstanding, The World's Strongest Dreams Of Being An Adventurer~

Я парировал все время, чтобы стать сильнейшим авантюристом

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đỡ Hết Mọi Thứ: Bạn bảo tôi là người mạnh nhất? Tôi còn chưa được làm mạo hiểm gia đâu đấy!

altTitles.ja: I WILL “PARRY” ALL - The world's strongest man dreams of an adventurer -

description.en:
Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! 

Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! 

Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! 

Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that...
 
---
 
Original Web Novel: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>
description.vi:
Kể từ khi còn nhỏ, Noor luôn muốn sắm vai trở thành mạo hiểm gia trong những câu chuyện của cha cậu - dũng sĩ diệt rồng, pháp sư quyền năng, những vị anh hùng luôn dang tay giúp đỡ những người yếu thế. Nhưng để trở thành một mạo hiểm gia thực thụ là cả một quá trình đổ mồ hôi sôi nước mắt.

Không may cho Noor, chiêu [Đỡ] của cậu lại phế toàn tập, thất bại nối tiếp thất bại, mọi người ai ai cũng khuyên cậu từ bỏ. Đối mặt với thực tại tàn khốc này, Noor biết chỉ còn một cách duy nhất để khẳng định bản thân: Chính là luyện tập thật khắc nghiệt! Một khóa huấn luyện đơn độc, khốc liệt chắc chắn sẽ hiệu quả. Nếu một năm không thành, thì phải luyện thêm năm năm. Nếu năm năm vẫn không thạo, phải tập thêm mười năm!

Hai mươi cái xuân xanh sắp trôi qua, trong khi bạn bè đồng trang lứa đã thành đạt, mình cậu vẫn giậm chân tại chỗ. Tuy vậy, giấc mơ trở thành mạo hiểm gia trong cậu vẫn rực cháy, Noor quyết tâm một lần cuối cùng để thực hiện khát khao đó. Dẫu không hiểu rõ việc phiêu lưu nghĩa là gì, nhưng cần cù bù siêng năng, chỉ cần cố gắng là được!

Hãy cùng theo dõi bước chân từ chàng mạo hiểm gia trẻ tuổi trở thành người mạnh nhất lục địa...
description.pt-br: Desde que era um menino, Noor queria ser como os aventureiros das histórias de seu pai — matadores de dragões, quebradores de maldições, heróis que sempre salvam o dia. Mas, como todos sabem, para ser um aventureiro, é preciso ter as habilidades certas!Infelizmente para Noor, sua [Parry] é completamente inútil, suas perspectivas são inexistentes, e todos que ele conhece estão dizendo para ele desistir. Diante dessa dura realidade, ele percebe que só há uma coisa a fazer: compensar isso com esforço! Um intenso regime de treinamento solitário deve resolver. Se um ano não for suficiente, ele treinará por cinco! Se não forem cinco, dez!Agora, ao final dos seus vinte e poucos anos, sem novas habilidades para mostrar pelo seu trabalho árduo, Noor decide se tornar um aventureiro mesmo assim, determinado a tentar uma última vez para realizar seu sonho. Ele pode não saber nada sobre aventuras, mas não é estranho ao trabalho duro! Agora, se ele apenas conseguir descobrir por que todos continuam olhando para ele daquele jeito..

"From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!"

Ryuto, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. 

That encounter turns everything upside down. 

Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!

description.en: Alfred, the third prince of the royal family who was born with black hair and black eyes, was hated. One day, he comes across his older brother, the first prince, Leolu, announcing to his fiancée, Charlotte, that she has broken off their engagement. In order to save Charlotte, who was falsely accused, Alfred took her place and thought the situation was settled...!?
description.ja: 王族で唯一の黒髪黒眼に生まれ、忌み嫌われる第三王子・アルフレッド。ある日、兄である第一王子・レオルが婚約者であるシャルロットに婚約破棄を宣言する場に出くわす。冤罪をかけられたシャルロットを救うため、アルフレッドが身代わりとなり事態は一件落着、と思いきや……!?

description.en: A young girl named Ji Yue, finds herself drawn into the world of "Alice in Wonderland," a fairytale book left behind by her missing brother. Alongside Long Ya, an apprentice librarian at the Ark Library, they discover that the once idyllic fairytale paradise described in the book has transformed into a twisted haven of sin. Pursuing clues related to this darkened paradise left by her brother, Ji Yue and her companions set off on a quest to find her brother and unravel the true nature of this distorted wonderland.

A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. description.en: In 2020, a large creature rampages through Tokyo, destroying everything in its path. In 1959, Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya, is kidnapped for ransom—and not a soul notices. When a typhoon hits Nagoya, Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive. But there’s more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.
description.es-la: En 2020, una gran criatura arrasa Tokio, destruyendo todo a su paso. En 1959, Asa Asada, una valiente joven de una gran familia de Nagoya, es secuestrada para pedir un rescate y nadie se da cuenta. Cuando un tifón golpea Nagoya, Asa y su secuestrador deben trabajar juntos para sobrevivir. Pero el secuestrador y la tormenta son más de lo que parece.
description.pt-br: Em 2020, uma grande criatura invade Tóquio, destruindo tudo em seu caminho. Em 1959, Asa Asada, uma jovem corajosa de uma família enorme em Nagoya, é sequestrada por resgate – e nem uma alma percebe. Quando um tufão atinge Nagoya, Asa e seu sequestrador devem trabalhar juntos para sobreviver. Mas há mais em seu sequestrador e nesta tempestade do que aparenta.

description.en:
Mai Amai --a girl who loves sweets-- got dumped by her girlfriend, and she's still grappling with the heartbreak. One day, the café she works at gets a new employee: The gorgeous Riri Kurosaki. Mai falls head over heels for her before realizing Riri is actually a succubus!

"I want to eat you and your parfaits right up! <3"
Thus starts a cute and trendy, but devilish, girls' romantic comedy!
description.ja: 甘いものが大好きな女の子・天井真衣は、付き合っていた彼女に振られて傷心中。ある日、勤務先のカフェの新人としてやってきた美少女・黒崎梨々に一目惚れをするも、なんと彼女は"サキュバス"という悪魔で……？パフェもあなたも食べちゃいたい♡ ポップでキュートな悪魔ティックガールズラブコメ、スタート！

description.en:
Decommisioned police officer Zhounan, is perplexed by a peculiar psychological experience. Upon contact with any object, he is able to perceive an individual's thoughts and envision what they experienced. Evidently he finds himself entangled within the city he is in - the numerous legends within the Lost City cities. And those seemingly absurd legends hide surprising secrets. A weird world slowly opens its doors to us…

---

description.en: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl. Her adventure starts just like that. Yuna began doing whatever she wanted.
description.ru:
Пятнадцатилетняя девочка Юна уже три года ведет жизнь хиккикомори. Друзей, школу и даже родителей ей заменяют Интернет и онлайн-игры. Год назад она начала играть в игру «Fantasy World Online» — RPG с виртуальной реальностью. Она заработала миллиарды и с помощью денег избавилась от присутствия родителей.  
  
И вот, вышло новое глобальное обновление. Как игрок с большим стажем, она по акции получила уникальный костюм. Затем прошла опрос и вместо игры оказалась в глухом лесу. Письмо от Бога? Другой мир? Что за бред?  
  
В своем новом костюме она читер. Без него обычная девочка. Так началось ее приключение, в котором она решила делать то, что ей захочется.

description.en: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.
description.pt-br: O aventureiro de meia-idade, Lucas, passa seus dias com jovens aventureiros enquanto eles o tratam como um burro de carga. Mas enquanto ele estava bêbado, ele foi capaz de tirar a espada lendária de uma rocha que ninguém jamais foi capaz de fazer. Com o poder da espada lendária que a deusa da vitória e do amor criaram, o velho agora viaja seu caminho como o herói (sem querer) enquanto cria um harém. Antes de perguntar, não é isekai porque ele está neste mundo desde o primeiro dia.

description.en:
Novice lyricist Baek Jiseok enters A&R Co. through a recommendation from his college senior and is assigned to compose the lyrics of a new song for renowned singer Cha Doyoon. However, his lyrics are stolen, and he finds himself on the brink of a lawsuit. 
The person who extends a helping hand in this situation to the desperate Jiseok is none other than Cha Doyoon?!
"Why are you helping me?"
Will Jiseok be able to pen his lyrics successfully even as he cohabitates with the unfathomable Doyoon?

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

By the Author that brought you <Eternally Regressing Knight> 

Seamdang, a small hermitage nestled in the foothills of Jirisan, is filled with the fragrance of pear blossoms

description.en:
Eldest daughter of the Zhan family, Zhan Chuyi, whose been raised in a carefree environment for over two decades, decides to take over the family business smoothly and starts working hard to build her career. She sets her sights on a nearly bankrupt film company as her practice ground. It just so happens that her new neighbor is the top actress of this company, so naturally, she tries to get close to her.

No dress ? Wear mine.
No money? Spend my money.
No guests? Sure, I'll attend!
No one to take care of the cat? Well, I guess I could do that too.

She successfully acquires the small company and also ends up... gaining a beautiful jiejie.

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---

- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

"If I slash, it will be cut."

I, who was once called the best swordsman in the nation, have ended up in a mobile game I've only spent money on a few times. And I’ve even received the blessing of the 'Sword God'!

But… the only weapon I can use is a sashimi knife?

Just one minute a day. I become a Sword Saint with a sashimi knife.

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.

description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

---

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

---

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

altTitles.en: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 航宙軍士官、冒険者になる

altTitles.pt-br: Capitão Corinth: Um Oficial da Marinha Galáctica Torna-se um Aventureiro

altTitles.en: Captain Corinth: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

description.en:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!
description.pt-br:
A nave espacial que o oficial da Marinha Imperial Galáctica que Alan Corinth estava foi derrubada por um ataque surpresa durante a navegação no hiperespaço.

Completamente a deriva, e sobre uma estranha coincidência, Alan se tornou o único na nave a sobreviver. A nave espacial severamente danificada perdeu suas capacidades de navegação e despencou em um planeta próximo.

Usando uma cápsula de fuga, Alan dirigiu-se ao planeta sozinho.

Assim começou a busca de Alan pela sobrevivência no planeta subdesenvolvido utilizando as nanomáquinas simbiótica dentro de seu corpo.

Surpreendentemente, o planeta era o lar de uma próspera civilização humana cujo código genético se assemelhava ao de Alan.

Mesmo permanecendo perdido devido a ser jogado em um mundo de espadas e magia, ele tenta viver o melhor que pode junto com seus novos companheiros.

O que Alan conseguiria nesse mundo estranho?

A história de fantasia de ficção científica em um cenário medieval agora começa!

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

altTitles.ja: メジャーセカンド

altTitles.en: Major 2nd

description.en: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

altTitles.en: 1st Grade Fighting Tutoring
First-Class Fighting Tutoring

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

altTitles.ja: ちみどろアイスクリーム

altTitles.en: Bloodstained Ice-cream

description.en: Class rep Minegishi Hinata is saved from a traffic accident by the new transfer student Nagatsuki Shion, who survives the crash as it is revealed she is half-human and half-zombie. However, the impact from the crash breaks Shion's special apparatus that keeps her heart beating, and if Shion's heart stops for even a moment, she'll become a full zombie! The only way to prevent that from happening is for Hinata to get Shion's heart pounding...

title.en: Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Pan wo Yaitara Seijo ni Job Change Shimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 断罪された悪役令嬢ですが、パンを焼いたら聖女にジョブチェンジしました!?

description.en: Even spirits are enthralled by Tia's homemade bread! After being reincarnated into the world of a girls' game and finishing her punishment as the villainous lady, all that's left is to live freely!! Having exited the public eye as planned, Avaritia has taken up bread-making, a hobby of her previous life, and is working hard to spread its deliciousness to the people of the other world, who have only ever known hard, difficult-to-eat bread.

altTitles.ja: セルフポートレイト

description.en: Getting influenced by an old anime "Rabbit Portrait", Usapo has sworn to be a strong and lovely girl! She rises up to save all the troubled girls who have lost their place of belonging! In a "game" that unfolds in extreme conditions, the true nature of human will be revealed! This is a dark and cute battle between the troubled kids!

altTitles.en: Delinquent high school girl KuzuHana-chan
Yankee high school girl KuzuHana-chan

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

title.en: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre
Le quotidien de Sa-chan, une employée de pharmacie

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我牧师，都什么阴间技能

altTitles.vi: Tiān Shēng Dú Nǎi, Wǒ Zǔzhòule Quán Shìjiè!

description.en:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

altTitles.ja: ID:INVADED イド:インヴェイデッド #BRAKE BROKEN
イド:インヴェイデッド　#ブレーキ・ブロークン

description.en:
I was awakened at an interchange on a certain highway. ? Unconsciousness accelerates! An original comic version newly created for comics by the original anime staff called Otaro Maijo and Yuuki Kodama!  
  
**Note:** The manga is the rightful sequel to the original anime, confirmed by the staff.

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.ja: ときめけ魔法幼女ココピュア

description.en: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.
